name: PSY-Framegear Delta
effectText: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. When your opponent activates a Spell Card while you control no monsters (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon both this card from your hand and 1 "PSY-Frame Driver" from your hand, Deck, or GY, and if you do, negate that activation, and if you do that, destroy that Spell. During the End Phase, banish the face-up monsters Special Summoned by this effect.
